front.title: Systems and software engineering -- Life cycle processes -- Project management

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This International Standard specifies the required content of the project management plan (PMP). This International Standard also quotes the extracted purpose and outcome statements from the project processes of ISO/IEC 12207:2008 (IEEE Std 12207-2008) and ISO/IEC 15288:2008 (IEEE Std 15288-2008), and adds detailed guidance for managing projects that use these processes for software products and software intensive systems.
